word_mean: 测量水平和垂直角度和方位的仪器。
测量水平角、垂直角以及为视距尺配合测量距离的仪器。

sentence.Network_en: An improved theodolite fixed with a simple laser direction indicator was introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了用一种简易激光指向器改装经纬仪,使普通经纬仪带有激光指向器.

sentence.Network_en: It builds coordinate and their correlations of photoelectricity theodolite.
sentence.Network_cn: 建立了光电经纬仪的各种坐标系及其相互关系.

sentence.Network_en: This thesis analyses causes of errors of the theodolite examination.
sentence.Network_cn: 分析了光学经纬仪检定方法中产生的误差的来源和大小.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 地下水准测量经纬仪,经纬仪(Theodolite)是用来量度赤经、赤纬的,它是一种具有许多天文望远镜特性的观测装置,测量水平角和竖直角的仪器, 大地测量、观鸟等用途.

激光经纬仪-概念激光经纬仪(laser theodolite)是带有激光指向装置的经纬仪。 应用激光经纬仪将激光器发射的激光束,导入经纬仪的望远镜筒内,使其沿视准轴方向.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally denoting an instrument for measuring horizontal angles): from modern Latin theodelitus, of unknown origin

means.word_mean: 1. a surveying instrument for measuring horizontal and vertical angles, consisting of a small telescope mounted on a tripod
